content:
# CLI Usage Guide

The retainr CLI provides commands for interacting with the memory server:

## Available Commands

### Save Memory
```bash
retainr save memory.json
```

### Search Memories
```bash
retainr recall "query text" --project myapp --top 5
```

### List Memories
```bash
retainr list --project retainr --limit 10
```

### Update Memory
```bash
retainr update <memory-id> --outdated
```

### Check Status
```bash
retainr status
```

The CLI uses Rich for beautiful terminal output and supports multiple output formats (rich, json, plain).
